channel.title: For all the people who think online bullying is funny
channel.description:
Hello all,
My name is Brian. and to tell you a little about myself; I am 21 years old dealing with depression but beating it everyday. Who ever is reading this I am 100% sure you are dealing with the same thing. Everyone does. Now to get to the point; There is someone that 85% ALL know who might have commited suicide today because of the fucking people on here and other rsps sites. I hope each and everyone one of you know that when you call someone a fag or a piece of shit or whatever you ARE talking to a human being. We ALL have feelings. Go ahead, call me a pussy or whoever else for having feelings, but the fact of the matter is we all give a shit what is said to us.
I dont care if you don't like what someone posted or what their server looks like. you DO NOT have to tell them they need to die because their fking enums look like shit or they missed a damn bracket. WHO GIVES A FLYING FUCK?!? WE ARE FUCKING KIDS! Grow up and stop acting like that because this is the kind of shit that happens. People take everything you say personally whether they know it or not, it does effect them.
calming down now. PLEASE people, watch what you say to people because it does effect them..
I AM NOT SAYING THIS AGAIN! THIS THREAD IS NOT ABOUT ME, I AM NOT WHINING BECAUSE SOMEONE CALLED ME A NAME, I AM NOT SUICIDAL, MY FEELINGS HAVE NOT BEEN HURT. READ THE POST AND STOP ASSUMING!

item.title: For all the people who think online bullying is funny
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:142, topic:442327”][quote author=Dunder Mifflin link=topic=544961.msg3995440#msg3995440 date=1337208068]

Will a mod please lock this thread? I don’t think any more damage needs to be done.

you’re just tired of being constantly proved wrong. fucking idiot dude. you’re just one, of a bunch of pussies that cry over a name calling.
[/quote]
If you pay close attention, 3 pages of this was spamming and trolling… This topic was getting derailed…[/quote]

welcome to moparscape

Read full topic

item.title: For all the people who think online bullying is funny
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

If you read up top you’ll see the link I posted. This is what I’ve been talking about through this whole post…

You can act as though nothing is bothering you by putting up a barrier, you can tell yourself that you don’t give two shits what he said to you but indirectly it has a huge impact on you. Look at the the kids who shoot up their school; I know they weren’t completely messed up in the head. A lot had to do with verbal abuse.
Hope his family and friends are okay.

Read full topic

I seriously doubt someone being an idiot on moparscape can cause someone to commit suicide.

item.title: For all the people who think online bullying is funny
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Kierian Bailey or as most of you know him, (Baddy351) committed suicide.

I live in the same city as him & knew him personally, ever since him & I got into a fight, his life started to go to shit, he didn’t care about anything, or anyone anymore, he 90% of the time got picked on by others (you know who you are…) and he just like… snapped I don’t know the full story of what happened. His mother called me CRYING (And I believe Jack Hopson according to a Facebook status), informing me of the incident.

Read full topic

The internet isn’t a place for feelings. No matter where you go, you’ll encounter an asshole who will say some shit like that. If you don’t like it, leave. The internet isn’t for you at that point.
[/quote]
